definition: eager to excel/eager to get ahead in life/strong-minded
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Stronger is useless, why not Lele eyes?
sentences.chinese: 要強既是沒用，何不樂樂眼前呢？

sentences.english: Humans have a much greater ability than rats for deactivating the potential toxicity of the substance.
sentences.chinese: 人類對潛在的毒性物質滅活能力比大鼠要強一些。

sentences.english: A bean in liberty is better than a comfit in prison.
sentences.chinese: 閒散的豆子總比監禁的糖果要強。

sentences.english: The least of man's original emanation is better than the best of borrowed thought.
sentences.chinese: 人最渺小的原創火花也比最優秀的拾人牙慧要強。

sentences.english: Eat nothing, therefore, which a stronger fire than the fire of life has killed.
sentences.chinese: 因此，不要喫比生命之火還要強的火所殺死的食物。

sentences.english: Then she found that pitchblende was more radioactive than uranium by itself.
sentences.chinese: 於是她發現瀝青油礦，它的放射性要比鈾本身還要強。

sentences.english: It is better to be looked over than overlooked.
sentences.chinese: 被人仰視總比被人看不起要強的多。

sentences.english: Water dampens any inherent aggression and impulse of this powerfulsign.
sentences.chinese: 水能冷卻任何內在的好勝心和要強的衝動。

sentences.english: But it is much better than before Mr Hennequin's reign.
sentences.chinese: 但與亨內昆接手之前比起來要強上許多了。

sentences.english: It's better to tell your money /where/ to go than to ask /where/ it went.
sentences.chinese: 告訴我如何支配錢比說錢已用於何處要強。

sentences.english: Stainless steel has a greater elastic springback than mild steel.
sentences.chinese: 不鏽鋼的彈性反衝比低碳鋼要強。

sentences.english: The pet owners interacted more with neighbors than non-owners.
sentences.chinese: 結果證明，寵物主人的溝通能力比其他人要強得多。

sentences.english: This kid's center is thin, domestic in the future definitely have to be mighty than me.
sentences.chinese: 這孩子心細，將來管家一定比我要強。

sentences.english: White tea is stronger in sterilization than green tea.
sentences.chinese: 白茶的殺菌效果也要強過綠茶。

sentences.english: Without doubt, it is vastly better to have a college degree than to lack one.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，有大學文憑比沒有要強千倍。

definition: at the minimum/at the very least
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
